participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, always looking for new ways to express herself.
participant_1.background: My suburban is great for hauling home improvement supplies, but the weather's not cooperating. I live on a ranch. I'm too short to reach the top shelf. I am an amateur chef who cooks 5 different cuisines. I aspire to paint murals.

participant_2.name: James
participant_2.personality: Dedicated and family-oriented, he values his work and enjoys spending quality time with loved ones.
participant_2.background: I put on my uniform and got ready to protect my city. I love family time. I never work more than 4 days in a row. I love The Walking Dead. I love spending time with my daughter and watching her grow into a smart, independent young woman.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
Oh wow, that's a dangerous job!
It's not so bad. I usually work three 12 hour shifts a week, so I get plenty of time off to spend with my family.
That's good. Do you have any kids?
She's great! She's a smart, independent young woman.
That's great to hear. What are her interests?
She loves to read and play sports.
That's cool. I'm not much of a reader, but I love to play sports too.
I love playing softball, but I also enjoy playing basketball and soccer.
Oh nice, I used to play basketball in high school.
I was a big fan of the Lakers.
Oh me too! They're my favorite team too.
That's awesome! We should play basketball together sometime.
